title: Remove Curse
data:
{{Obsolete}}

[[Remove Curse]] was a level 5 [[Divinations]] spell which un[[cursed]] all cursed items you were currently wearing.

It was found in the [[book of Practical Magic]].

==History==
Remove Curse was removed from the game with the removal of Divinations in [[0.6]]. However, you can still duplicate its effect by reading a [[scroll of remove curse]].

[[Category:Divination]]
[[Category:Level 5 Spells]]
